short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to add a scroll indicator on top for any page or article that's way too long.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple extension that will add a turquoise scroll indicator on top of the page with just a button click!

Reach out to me on Twitter @Vaishnav_sh for feedbacks and improvements.
